column2:
"Thank you for your report. Let's have a look...
Yes, this should do."

"I hereby raise the difficulty limit on your missions,
<%me>."

"Now, some advice just for you. Now that your
difficulty cap has been lifted, your battles will
become harder from here on out."

"Even the hostiles you easily dealt with before
will be far stronger and are sure to turn
their attentions toward you."

"Lottie has issued a client order.

Lottie is at the south corridor in the shop area."

"Lubert has issued a client order.

Lubert is at the south corridor in the shop area."
